Observability: The robot must display where they can/cannot be deployed (v)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict when the robot will be deployed (instantaneous)
Directability: The player must be able to direct where the robot will be deployed (v)

Observability: The robot must display when it is selected/not selected (v)
The robot and the player should be able to see the projected path on the map (x)
Predictability: The player should be able to predict the future positions of the robot (x)
Directability: The player (v) and the robot (x) should be able to modify the path

Task: Ensure each step of the path is movable
Observability: The player must be able to access the robot's camera feed to assess that the path is movable  (v)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict the capacity to move of each robot (x)
Directability: The player should be able help to the robot identifying non-movable tiles (x)

Observability: The robot and the player should be able to see the projected path on the map (x)
Directability: The player (v) and the robot (x) should be able to modify the path

Observability: The player should be able to see the robot's location on the map (v)
Predictability: The time to execute a footstep, and future position must be predictable for the player (x)
Directability: The player should be able to instruct the robot to take a single step (v)

Observability: The player must be able to access the robot's camera feed to assess that the path is movable (v)
The player/UAV should be able to make observable muddy terrain to the UGV (x)
Directability: The player/UAV should be able to direct the robot not to step on muddy terrain (v)

Task: Sense a robot that can be lifted
Observability: The UAV should display when it is able to lift a UGV (v)

Directability: The player should be able to direct the UAV to lift the UGV (v)

Observability: The UAV should display when it is lifting a UGV, the UGV should display when it is being lifted (v)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict movable terrain in lifting mode (x)

Directability: The UAV must be able to lift the UGV over water (v)
The UAV must be able to lift the UGV over cliffs (v)

Observability: The player must be able to see the amount of wood transported by the UGV to place bridges (v); The player should be able to see where the UGV plan on placing a bridge (x)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict the location of the bridge and when it will be placed (x)
Directability: The player should be able to stop/modify the bridge plan; the player should be able to direct the UGV to place a bridge (x)

Observability: The UGV should display the possible location for placing the bridge (v)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict the location of the bridge (v)

Observability: The robot must display battery level; the robot must alert when battery is low (v)
Predictability: The player should be able to predict battery depletion of the robots (x)

Task: Stop executing steps of the path
Observability: The robot must alert when path execution has been canceled (v)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict when the path will be stopped by the robots (x)
Directability: The player should be able to stop the execution of the path (v)
The player should be able to send the path to the robot for execution (x)

Observability: The robot must display when it is charging (v)
Predictability: The player must be able to predict when battery will be recharged (x)
Directability: The player should be able to stop and resume battery charging (x)

Observability: The player must be able to access the robot's camera feed to see the wood/mineral in the environment (v)

Directability: The player should be able to help the robot identifying the resources (x)

Observability: The player should know the overall resources collected and available at base (v)
Directability: The player should be able to direct the UGV to collect resources (v)

Observability: The UGV should display the type and number of resources collected (v)
Predictability: The player should be able to predict how much more resources the UGV can collect (v)

Task: Decide to carry the resources back at the base
Directability: The player should be able to direct the UGV to go back at the base

Observability: The UGV must display when the resources are dropped at the base (v)
Predictability: The player should be able to predict that the resources will be automatically dropped at the base when in proximity (x)
Directability: The player should be able to stop the UGV from dropping resources (x)

Observability: The player must have access to the anomaly sensor value (v)

Task: Understand the local gravitational anomaly trends
Observability: The player must have access to the local anomaly trend  (v)

Task: Understand the global gravitational anomaly trend
Observability: The player must have access to the aggregation of the anomaly values on the map (v)

Task: Plan path to track high anomaly values
Observability: The player must be able to know when the robot has reached a maxima (v)
Directability: The player should be able to nudge the robot to get out of a local maxima (v)

Observability: The stuck robot should send an alert (v)

Task: Decide to send a rescue robot
Observability: The player should know which robot are capable of rescuing the stuck robot (x) ; the player should know which robot is available (v)
Directability: The player should be able to select an available robot (v); the player should be able to send the rescue robot to the stuck robot's position (v)

Observability: The player should be able to know that the robot has been rescued (v)
Predictability: The player should be able to predict when the robot will be rescued (x)

Observability: The player must be able to access the robot's camera feed to see the monolith in the environment (v)
